questions.question: This type of renewable energy project involves using solar panels to convert sunlight into electricity.
questions.answer: What is a Solar Power System?

questions.question: This type of renewable energy project involves using wind turbines to generate electricity from wind.
This term refers to the practice of using organic materials, such as plant and animal waste, to produce energy.
This type of renewable energy project involves using the heat from the Earth's interior to generate electricity.
This term refers to the practice of using water to generate electricity, often through the use of dams.
